BR_text.BRsummary: Downloading jq from github in dev entrypoint is sometimes stuck
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-code>--2020-04-09 15:44:07--  https://github.com/stedolan/jq/releases/download/jq-1.6/jq-linux64
 Resolving github.com (github.com)... 140.82.114.3
 Connecting to github.com (github.com)|140.82.114.3|:443... connected.
 
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text: Instead of downloading jq from the entrypoint which is flaky and takes a little time for script to complete, we could mount the binary in compose-overrides.

comments_1.comment_text: Instead of mounting a binary, we should mount the overriden config files via custom-compose overrides.
